page.title: 19CHILDRENS ACTIVITIES
page.content:
Brownies meet every Wednesday, and they go and visit places once a year. Brownies' uniform is a brown dress,and a brown belt,and brown socks and a brown woolly hat,in summer they can were some brown shorts and a yellow teashirt. Boys Brigade
The Boys Brigade go to the United Reform Church on Wednesday and Thursday.It is only for boys aged 11 to 18 years.The boys brigades uniform is blue shorts,a black blazer,black trouers,and a blue hat. The activities they do are games going on walks,marching,and church services.
